bibl.title: Two Notes on the Greek Papyri from Kellis (Dakhleh Oasis).
bibl.note: 1. A number of hitherto unattested or seldom attested names of Egyptian origin occur in the Kellis Greek texts. Some of these names occur also in the Coptic documents from the same site. - 2. P. Kellis Gr. I, 46 concerns a loan of money and is drawn up in the form of a letter, an unusual form for Greek loans but not for Coptic ones.
ALCOCK Anthony, Two Notes on the Greek Papyri from Kellis (Dakhleh Oasis).
